Title: Google Cloud Natural Language API - codecentric AG Blog
FirstText: In this article I’d like to give you a short introduction to a subset of Google’s machine learning capabilities: the natural language API. This API processes text snippets and can apply several analysis algorithms: analyze-entities: detects entities (proper nouns such as public places, art, etc.), and returns information about those entities. analyze-sentiment: identifies the prevailing...
